mapper.select: SELECT * from user where name like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or tel like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%')

select user.id as id, user.name as name, user.age as age, user.sex as sex, user.tel as tel, user.content as content, user.img as img, user.create_date as createDate, user.update_date as updateDate, type.content as level, house.position as housePosition, house.area as area, house.`status` as houseStatus, car.position as carPosition, car.size as size, car.`status` as carStatus
FROM user,house,car,type where (user.id=house.user_id AND user.id=car.user_id AND user.type_id=type.id and user.id=#{id})
